name: Together Alone (Gottinn, thegreatbelo)
description:
Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2

Theme: You're not Alone

2nd Jam!

Two friends work together inside a spooky mansion full of interesting challenges in this puzzle platformer! Can you get you and your friend out of this predicament?
